summary: "One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest" is a 1975 American drama film directed by Milo≈° Forman, based on Ken Kesey's novel. The movie stars Jack Nicholson as a new patient in a mental institution, with Louise Fletcher as the strict head nurse. Filming took place in Oregon, including inside an actual psychiatric hospital. The film was highly acclaimed, winning all five major Academy Awards, and is considered one of the best films ever made. It's also culturally significant, being preserved in the National Film Registry.
title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (film)
